title: Vivek Kaku
text: I think the app is really good and easy to use and recent Updates are amazing,But one feature should be added that There should be an option to see the company details in brief or in detail in app. This can have many things like its core business, its establishment, its parent company, etc. And charges you have increased are very unfair, one of which is DP Charges per sell order instead of DP Charges per ISIN Number (company). I found this very unfair.
author: Vivek Kaku
